name: Blueprinter
title: Blueprinter
author: Qiyi Shan
description:
This mod gives you a new menu for creating various handy crafting blueprints. you can:
 1. create a single recipe crafting unit blueprint
 2. (developing) create a massive whole factory blueprints by specifying inputs, outputs and production rates.
This mod is currently under active development, please check for updates.
